Fisher king
 




Fisher shows up late but is crucial in the 127-117 win.  (Getty Images)



      Deron Williams' fouls and Dee Brown's injury hurt Utah, but Derek 
      Fisher, dealing with a family surgery, boosts 
      the Jazz to 2-0 lead in a OT win over the Warriors. The series 
      hinges on Williams-Baron Davis, 
      Tony Mejia says.
